name: Dumb Ways To Die - Pillock's Magic Smoochies Mobile Edition
name_original: Dumb Ways To Die - Pillock's Magic Smoochies Mobile Edition
description:
Dumb Ways To Die - Pillock's Magic Smoochies Mobile Edition is a game developed by Numpty-From-DWTD. It was originally released in 2022.
Dumb Ways To Die - Pillock's Magic Smoochies Mobile Edition is available on Web. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
